mapper.select: /* getVersionCheckCount */ SELECT current_version_code, current_version_name, is_forced_update, date_format(UPDATE_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') UPDATE_DTTM FROM app_version WHERE os_type = #{osType} AND version_key = (SELECT MAX(version_key) FROM app_version WHERE os_type = #{osType})

/* getVersionCheckCountByVersionCode */ SELECT count(*) FROM app_version WHERE is_forced_update = 1 AND current_version_code > #{currentVersionCodeParam} AND current_version_code <= #{currentVersionCodeDB}
/* queryAppUserCountByPhoneNumber */ SELECT count(*) FROM app_user WHERE mobile_phone_number = #{mobilePhoneNumber}
mapper.update: /* updateAppUser */ UPDATE app_user SET os_type = #{os_type}, os_version = #{os_version}, device = #{device}, token = #{token}, regdate = #{time} WHERE mobile_phone_number = #{mobile_phone_number}
mapper.insert: /* insertAppUser */ INSERT INTO app_user (user_key, mobile_phone_number, os_type, os_version, device, token, regdate) VALUES (null, #{mobile_phone_number}, #{os_type}, #{os_version}, #{device}, #{token}, #{time})
mapper.select: /* queryAppUserNoByToken */ SELECT app_user.user_key FROM app_user WHERE token = #{token}
mapper.insert: /* insertAppQuestion */ INSERT INTO app_question (question_key, content, registration_time, user_key) VALUES (null, #{content}, #{time}, #{userKey})
mapper.select: /* queryAppUserCount */ SELECT count(*) FROM app_user WHERE token = #{token}

/* queryQuestionAnswerList */ SELECT q.question_key AS question_key, q.content AS content, date_format(q.registration_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS registration_time, q.user_key AS user_key, a.answer_key, a.content AS a_content, date_format(a.registration_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS a_registration_time, a.question_key AS a_question_key FROM app_question q LEFT JOIN app_answer a ON q.question_key = a.question_key WHERE user_key = (SELECT user_key FROM app_user WHERE token = #{token}) ORDER BY question_key ASC, registration_time DESC
mapper.insert: /* insertCertificationCode */ INSERT INTO certification_code (method, certification_code, time) VALUES (#{mobile_phone_number}, #{certificationCode}, #{time}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE certification_code = #{certificationCode}, time = #{time}, method = #{mobile_phone_number}
mapper.select: /* queryCertificationCode */ SELECT certification_code.certification_code FROM certification_code WHERE method = #{mobilePhoneNumber}

/* queryAppBizcard */ SELECT company_name, name, phone_number, mobile_phone_number, mail, office_addr, position, image_url, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') regdate FROM app_bizcard WHERE SEQUENCE = #{sequence}
